label: 尾張萬歳
対訳語: A folk performance to celebrate the New Year
本: Sand and Pebbles: The Tales of Mujû Ichien, A Voice for Pluralism in Kamakura Buddhism . State University of New York Press . 1985
説明文: The performance survives even today as a local custom in the Chita Region, on a small peninsula just south of Nagoya. Local tradition has it that Mujū composed the original performance and called it Manzaigaku (p. 43). [知多、名古屋、無住、万歳楽]
